skill.content:
# ðŸ”µ Service 3: LoLLMs Exclusive Services **Base URL Path:** `/lollms/v1`
These endpoints provide access to features unique to LoLLMs that are not covered by standard specs.
### ðŸ§© Tokenizer & Utilities * **`POST /lollms/v1/tokenize`**: Returns integer token IDs. * `{"model": "binding/model", "text": "..."}` * **`POST /lollms/v1/detokenize`**: Converts token IDs back into text. * `{"model": "binding/model", "tokens": [1, 2, 3]}`
### ðŸŽ™ï¸ Text-to-Speech (TTS) * **`POST /lollms/v1/audio/speech`**: Generates audio from text (OpenAI compatible). * `{"input": "text", "voice": "alloy", "model": "...", "response_format": "mp3"}` * **`GET /lollms/v1/audio/voices`**: Lists all available voices.
### ðŸ“„ Long Context Processing * **`POST /lollms/v1/long_context_process`**: Automatically chunks, summarizes, and synthesizes text that exceeds the model's context window. * `{"text": "...", "prompt": "Summarize this 500-page doc", "max_generation_tokens": 4096}`
### ðŸ—„ï¸ RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) * **`GET /lollms/v1/rag/databases`**: Lists all RAG datastores (private and public). * **`POST /lollms/v1/rag/query`**: Query a private Data Store for semantic similarity chunks. * `{"datastore_id": "uuid", "query": "...", "top_k": 5}`
### ðŸŽ¨ Advanced Image Editing * **`POST /lollms/v1/images/edit`**: Image-to-Image (ITI) service for AI-driven edits or in-painting. * `{"image": "base64", "prompt": "Change cat to tiger", "mask": "optional_base64"}`
